label: water
caption: A young girl, dressed in a crisp white coat, stands playfully in the center of a serene fountain, surrounded by gently splashing water. The sun casts a warm glow on the scene, causing the droplets to sparkle like tiny diamonds. Meanwhile, her friend, a boy with an infectious grin, looks on from the background, clearly enjoying the impromptu water feature that has brought so much joy to their afternoon.
